name: Out of Control! (MMathew93)
description:
OH NO! You find yourself stranded on the moon after that last adventure filled outing in your spaceship. You need to make it back home before you run out of oxygen, but something weird is going on...

Spacial radiation has left your brain confuzzled and now up isn't up, and down might not be down!

Be quick and nimble as you try to regain your sense of directions and sprint to the exit wormhole to get back home!

*Bro there are bugs and issues with this game but I'm late and I don't care atm, I COMPLETED MY FIRST GAME JAM
